FuncDef: The display traffic-segment resource-usage command displays information about chip resources used by an EPG. The display traffic-segment resource-usage command displays information about chip resources used by an EPG. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.
